text:
Norman Mark Reedus (born January 6, 1969) is an American actor, model and artist. He is known for starring as Daryl Dixon in the AMC series "The Walking Dead" (2010–present) and Murphy MacManus in the movie "The Boondock Saints" (1999) and its sequel ' (2009). He is the host of "Ride with Norman Reedus". He performed the motion capture and voice acting for the main character Sam in Hideo Kojima's video game "Death Stranding" (2019). He has also modeled for companies such as Prada and Levi's.
Reedus was born in Hollywood, Florida. He has a child with Danish model Helena Christensen. He is now in a relationship with German model Diane Kruger. The couple have one child.
